meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is out, the sky is <radical>blue</radical>, things have begun to <kanji>clear up</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: Now that it's starting to <kanji>clear up</kanji> you can't help but laugh. "<reading>Ha</reading> (は)! Ha ha ha!" you laugh up into the sky. The sun feels great on your face, making you feel lively! And that blue sky ain't too shabby either.
